languages.text: "Зачем? Хочешь внушить этим детям иллюзию, что миру и правителям есть до них дело? Я не стану в это ввязываться".
"Why would I? Do you wish to fill these children's heads with the illusion that the world and its rulers care about them? I will have no part in this."
languages.original_text: "Зачем? Хочешь внушить этим детям иллюзию, что миру и правителям есть до них дело? Я не стану в это ввязываться".

traits.locale_text: "Why would I? Do you wish to fill these children's heads with the illusion that the world and its rulers care about them? I will have no part in this."
"Why would I? Do you wish to fill these children's heads with the illusion that the world and its rulers care about them? I will have no part in this."
"Why would I? Do you wish to fill these children's heads with the illusion that the world and its rulers care about them? I will have no part in this."
"Why would I? Do you wish to fill these children's heads with the illusion that the world and its rulers care about them? I will have no part in this."
"Why would I? Do you wish to fill these children's heads with the illusion that the world and its rulers care about them? I will have no part in this."

languages.text: “我凭什么要去见他们？你想向这些孩子们灌输假象，让他们误以为这个世界与它的统治者在乎他们吗？不，我是不会这么做的。”
languages.original_text: "Why would I? Do you wish to fill these children's heads with the illusion that the world and its rulers care about them? I will have no part in this."

traits.locale_text: “我凭什么要去见他们？你想向这些孩子们灌输假象，让他们误以为这个世界与它的统治者在乎他们吗？不，我是不会这么做的。”

languages.text: «¿Por qué iba a hacerlo? ¿Quiere acaso que los niños crean que le importan al mundo y a sus líderes? No pienso involucrarme en todo esto».
languages.original_text: "Why would I? Do you wish to fill these children's heads with the illusion that the world and its rulers care about them? I will have no part in this."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué iba a hacerlo? ¿Quiere acaso que los niños crean que le importan al mundo y a sus líderes? No pienso involucrarme en todo esto».

languages.text: 「なぜ{mf|俺|私}が？この子たちの頭を、世界とその支配者が自分たちを気にかけてくれているという幻想で満たしたいのか？{mf|俺|私}は関わるつもりはない」
languages.original_text: "Why would I? Do you wish to fill these children's heads with the illusion that the world and its rulers care about them? I will have no part in this."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ{mf|俺|私}が？この子たちの頭を、世界とその支配者が自分たちを気にかけてくれているという幻想で満たしたいのか？{mf|俺|私}は関わるつもりはない」

languages.text: "Weshalb sollte ich? Wollt Ihr wirklich die Illusion in den Köpfen dieser Kinder verankern, dass der Welt und ihren Herrschern etwas an ihnen liegt? Ohne mich!"
languages.original_text: "Why would I? Do you wish to fill these children's heads with the illusion that the world and its rulers care about them? I will have no part in this."

traits.locale_text: "Weshalb sollte ich? Wollt Ihr wirklich die Illusion in den Köpfen dieser Kinder verankern, dass der Welt und ihren Herrschern etwas an ihnen liegt? Ohne mich!"

languages.text: « Pourquoi faudrait-il que je les rencontre ? Voulez-vous les bercer d'illusions en leur faisant croire que le monde et ses dirigeants se soucient d'eux ? Laissez-moi en dehors de ça. »
languages.original_text: "Why would I? Do you wish to fill these children's heads with the illusion that the world and its rulers care about them? I will have no part in this."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi faudrait-il que je les rencontre ? Voulez-vous les bercer d'illusions en leur faisant croire que le monde et ses dirigeants se soucient d'eux ? Laissez-moi en dehors de ça. »

languages.text: "Neden tanışacakmışız? Dünyanın ve yöneticilerin bu çocukları umursadığını mı sanıyorsun? Çocukların beynini bu yanılgıyla zehirlememi mi istiyorsun? Bunun bir parçası olmayı reddediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Why would I? Do you wish to fill these children's heads with the illusion that the world and its rulers care about them? I will have no part in this."

traits.locale_text: "Neden tanışacakmışız? Dünyanın ve yöneticilerin, bu çocukları umursadığını mı sanıyorsun? Çocukların beynini, bu yanılgıyla zehirlememi mi istiyorsun? Bunun bir parçası olmayı reddediyorum."
